detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_create_handle creates the rocSPARSE library context. It must be initialized before any other rocSPARSE API function is invoked and must be passed to all subsequent library function calls. The handle should be destroyed at the end using rocsparse_destroy_handle().

parameterdescription.para: the pointer to the handle to the rocSPARSE library context.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_destroy_handle destroys the rocSPARSE library context and releases all resources used by the rocSPARSE library.

parameterdescription.para: the handle to the rocSPARSE library context.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_set_stream specifies the stream to be used by the rocSPARSE library context and all subsequent function calls.

parameterdescription.para: the handle to the rocSPARSE library context.
the stream to be used by the rocSPARSE library context.

simplesect.title: Example

briefdescription.para: Get current stream from library context.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_get_stream gets the rocSPARSE library context stream which is currently used for all subsequent function calls.

parameterdescription.para: the handle to the rocSPARSE library context.
the stream currently used by the rocSPARSE library context.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_set_pointer_mode specifies the pointer mode to be used by the rocSPARSE library context and all subsequent function calls. By default, all values are passed by reference on the host. Valid pointer modes are rocsparse_pointer_mode_host or rocsparse_pointer_mode_device.

parameterdescription.para: the handle to the rocSPARSE library context.
the pointer mode to be used by the rocSPARSE library context.

briefdescription.para: Get current pointer mode from library context.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_get_pointer_mode gets the rocSPARSE library context pointer mode which is currently used for all subsequent function calls.

parameterdescription.para: the handle to the rocSPARSE library context.
the pointer mode that is currently used by the rocSPARSE library context.

detaileddescription.para:
rocsparse_get_version gets the rocSPARSE library version number.
patch = version % 100
minor = version / 100 % 1000
major = version / 100000

parameterdescription.para: the handle to the rocSPARSE library context.
the version number of the rocSPARSE library.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_get_git_rev gets the rocSPARSE library git commit revision (SHA-1).

parameterdescription.para: the handle to the rocSPARSE library context.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_create_mat_descr creates a matrix descriptor. It initializes rocsparse_matrix_type to rocsparse_matrix_type_general and rocsparse_index_base to rocsparse_index_base_zero. It should be destroyed at the end using rocsparse_destroy_mat_descr().

parameterdescription.para: the pointer to the matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_copy_mat_descr copies a matrix descriptor. Both, source and destination matrix descriptors must be initialized prior to calling rocsparse_copy_mat_descr.

parameterdescription.para: the pointer to the destination matrix descriptor.
the pointer to the source matrix descriptor.
src or dest pointer is invalid.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_destroy_mat_descr destroys a matrix descriptor and releases all resources used by the descriptor.

briefdescription.para: Specify the index base of a matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_set_mat_index_base sets the index base of a matrix descriptor. Valid options are rocsparse_index_base_zero or rocsparse_index_base_one.

briefdescription.para: Get the index base of a matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_get_mat_index_base returns the index base of a matrix descriptor.

briefdescription.para: Specify the matrix type of a matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_set_mat_type sets the matrix type of a matrix descriptor. Valid matrix types are rocsparse_matrix_type_general, rocsparse_matrix_type_symmetric, rocsparse_matrix_type_hermitian or rocsparse_matrix_type_triangular.

briefdescription.para: Get the matrix type of a matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_get_mat_type returns the matrix type of a matrix descriptor.

briefdescription.para: Specify the matrix fill mode of a matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_set_mat_fill_mode sets the matrix fill mode of a matrix descriptor. Valid fill modes are rocsparse_fill_mode_lower or rocsparse_fill_mode_upper.

briefdescription.para: Get the matrix fill mode of a matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_get_mat_fill_mode returns the matrix fill mode of a matrix descriptor.

briefdescription.para: Specify the matrix diagonal type of a matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_set_mat_diag_type sets the matrix diagonal type of a matrix descriptor. Valid diagonal types are rocsparse_diag_type_unit or rocsparse_diag_type_non_unit.

briefdescription.para: Get the matrix diagonal type of a matrix descriptor.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_get_mat_diag_type returns the matrix diagonal type of a matrix descriptor.
rocsparse_create_hyb_mat creates a structure that holds the matrix in HYB storage format. It should be destroyed at the end using rocsparse_destroy_hyb_mat().

parameterdescription.para: the pointer to the hybrid matrix.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_destroy_hyb_mat destroys a HYB structure.

rocsparse_create_mat_info creates a structure that holds the matrix info data that is gathered during the analysis routines available. It should be destroyed at the end using rocsparse_destroy_mat_info().

parameterdescription.para: the pointer to the info structure.

detaileddescription.para: rocsparse_destroy_mat_info destroys a matrix info structure.

briefdescription.para: rocsparse-auxiliary.h provides auxilary functions in rocsparse
